In The Fog (In Progress)


Github Itch.io

As the player survives through waves of zombies, they can use the terminal to purchase health, ammo, and upgrades (yet to be added) to assist in defeating the growing number of zombies.

In The Fog is my first solo project. I created all the game mechanics and scripting, but I acquired the art assets through the Unity Asset Store.
